summary: This mod adds 63 different wall tapestries to the Underground Bathhouse replacing the red banners and adding to many empty walls. The tapestries contain nudity and mild graphical violence.
descriptionHtml:
Game: Skyrim
Mod Name: Underground Bathhouse - Erotic Wall Tapestry
Author: Andragon
Textures and Meshes: rip88
Version: 1.1

[b][size=5][color=#ff0000]This mod is no longer need for Underground Bathhouse Version 6+[/color][/size][/b]
as it is included in the main mod install file. Just use for older Versions.



Just a quick note: This is not pornographic in any way. Just artistic nudity that is freely found in any art museum.

[b]Description:[/b]
This mod adds 63 different wall tapestries of 44 different classic paintings to the Underground Bathhouse replacing the red banners and adding to many empty walls. The tapestries contain nudity and mild graphical violence.

We kept the graphics in a low setting to match the bathhouse overall look. This should have no or just a very little hit on performance.

[b]Idea[/b]
From the beginning the red banners kind of were a placeholder and something that keeps the Underground Bathhouse Non-Adult. But I always had the plan to do some kind of erotic wall tapestry including nude artwork and other adult features. So I choose public domain paintings for this and rip88 made the meshes and textures for all of them, something I don't know how to do. So this mod was only possible with the help of rip88.


[b]Change log:[/b]

v1.1
- changes made that were required by the version 5.0 of the bathhouse

v1.0
- initial release

[b]Required Files:[/b]
"Underground Bathhouse" v4.5 or higher by Andragon [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27361]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27361[/url]

Optional:
Any optional cell file that you run the Underground bathhouse with, is als converted so you can freely use any of those optional esp files.

[b]Installation:[/b]
Extract the Contents of the "Data" folder to, your skyrim\Data directory, (typically, C:\Programfiles\Steam\SteamApps\common\skyrim\Data)
Insure ub_tapestry.esp is turned on.
or
Use the NexusModManager to autoinstall.

[b]Uninstallation:[/b]
Remove;
ub_tapestry.esp from the data Data folder or disable the mod in NexusModManager

[b]Known Issues:[/b]
none so far

[b]Paintings Credits[/b]
All paintings used are long in the public domain but as courtesy commands here are the Artists , the name of the picture and the year or period is was painted. 44 paintings were used some of which I made multiple tapestries of, that are placed next to each other to show most of the paintings. The numbers are the same than the number used in the textures. Bear with me that I didn't translate all titles into English.

1 - Abraham Bloemaert - Niobe beweint ihre Kinder (1591)
2 - Hans von Aachen - Der Sieg der Wahrheit (1598)
3 - Lawrence Alma-Tadema - Ein bevorzugter Brauch (1909)
4 - Franz von Lenbach - Liegender weiblicher Akt (1902)
5 - Francois Gérard - Amor und Psyche (1814)
6 - Franz Xaver Winterhalter - Florinda (1853)
7 - Rogier van der Weyden - Jüngstes Gericht (middle 15th century)
8 - Sebastiano del Piombo - Martyrium der heiligen Agatha (1520)
9 - Rosso Fiorentino - Moses verteidigt die Töchter Jethros (around 1523)
10 - Pierre Auguste Renoir - Die großen Badenden (1887)
11 - Jean-Baptiste Regnault. ... Die drei Grazien (1793)
12 - Lorenzo Lotto - Venus and cupid (late 1520s)
13 - John Everett Millais - Cymon und Iphigenia. (1847/48)
14 - Jean Leon Gerome - The Birth of Venus (1890)
15 - Johann Heinrich Tischbein d.Ä. – Hercules und Omphale (1754)
16 - Hans Baldung Grien - Tod und Frau (1518–1520)
17 - Hans von Aachen - Allegorie von Friede - Kunst und Reichtum (1602)
18 - Gustave Courbet - Der Schlaf (1866)
19 - Guido Cagnacci - Tod der Kleopatra (after 1659)
20 - Giovanni Battista Tiepolo - Apollo und Daphne (1743/44)
21 - Unknown painter - Gabrielle d’Estrées und eine ihrer Schwestern (around 1594)
22 - Giorgio Vasari - Perseus befreit Andromeda (1570)
23 - Gheorghe Tattarescu - Akt mit Krug (unknown he lived from 1818–1894)
24 - François Boucher - Diana nach dem Bade (1742)
25 - Félicien Rops - Die Versuchung des Heiligen Antonius (1878)
26 - Edwin Long - Pharaos Tochter. Auffindung Moses. (1886)
27 - Cesar van Everdingen - Vertumnus und Pomona (around 1650)
28 - Luca Cambiaso - Entdeckung des Fehltritts der Kallistro (around 1570)
29 - Sandro Botticelli - Die Geburt der Venus (1482)
30 - Bartholomäus Spranger - Vulkan und Maia (around 1580)
31 - Agnolo Bronzino. Venus, Amor und Zeit (around 1545)
32 - Jacques-Louis David - Amor und Psyche (1817)
33 - Jan Massys - Flora (1559)
34 - Piero di Cosimo - Portrait der Simonetta Vespucci (1480/90)
35 - Adolphe-William Bouguereau - Die Geburt der Venus (1879)
36 - Élisabeth Vigée-Lebrun - Bacchante. (around 1785)
37 - Tizians - Venus von Urbino (1538)
38 - Giuseppe Cesari - Diana and Actaeon (1603-06)
39 - Joseph Heintz d. Ä. - Diana und Aktaion (1590s)
40 - Alexandre Cabanel - The Birth of Venus (1863)
41 - Hans Baldung-Grien - Der Tod und das Mädchen (1517)
42 - Hans Baldung-Grien - Die drei Lebensalter und der Tod (1510)
43 - Lovis Corinth - Die Versuchung des heiligen Antonius (1897)
44 - Willem Drost - Bathsheba (1654)

[b]other Credits:[/b]
RIP88, for making the meshes and textures. Check out his Summer Wear for Skyrim nsfw v2 at: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25237]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25237[/url] and also his other mods.
Bethesda, for another fun game.
author: Andragon
